Articles.Content:
So I recently got into Kerbal Space Program quite a bit, and immediately logged 400 or so hours. Soon enough, I found out KSP 2 Early Access was happening today. However, it seems that it's not for Mac. So I have 2 questions:

  • Will Mac support be added at some point?
  • How might I mod my Mac to make the Windows version work?

Thank you in advance.

MAC Support is in the plans, but no release date, possibly sometime after EA is over.

As to your second question, a windows VM or windows emulator. Not a mac user, so don't ask me which ones to use.
You can try CrossOver or Parallels to run the windows version on Mac. I’d love to hear about your results :)

There’s another mac thread but I’ll chime in here. Ive got a mid-range 2yo i7 macbook and I‘ve got things running through parallels, though the framerates were pretty bad until I upped the virtual machine’s ram. Still sluggish but playable and improving. More updates as I play with things.
